bookSourceComment:
普通搜索说明：
直接输入关键词可以进行普通搜索
（关键词两个字节以上，一个中文占两字节，多关键词用|分隔）
高级搜索使用方法如下：
①基本格式（括号表示可选）：
功能1（功能2功能3…） 关键词
ps：注意功能与关键词之间要有一个空格！要不然无法识别！各种功能的实现只需要包含功能关键词即可实现
②高级搜索功能关键词
1.局     进行部分匹配（默认搜索为完全匹配）
2.精     只显示精华帖
3.正     正序显示搜索结果（默认为倒序显示）
4.回复|时间|人气     按回复次数或发帖时间或帖子人气顺序显示搜索结果（默认为按最后回复时间早晚显示搜索结果，一次搜索仅使用其中一个！）
示例：局部精华人气 穿越
         正精 穿越

searchUrl:
<js>
var pa1= /( )(.*)/;
var pa2 =/.*?(?= )/;
var body = "step=2";
if (key.indexOf(" ")!=-1){
var str1=String(pa2.exec(key));
pa1.test(key);
var str2=RegExp.$2;
str2=java.encodeURI(str2,"gbk");
    body+="&keyword="+str2;
    body+=(str1.indexOf("局")!=-1)?"&pwuser=&method=OR":"";
    body+=(str1.indexOf("精")!=-1)?"&digest=1":"";
    body+=(str1.indexOf("回复")!=-1)?"&orderway=replies":"";
    body+=(str1.indexOf("时间")!=-1)?"&orderway=postdate":"";
    body+=(str1.indexOf("人气")!=-1)?"&orderway=hits":"";
    body+=(str1.indexOf("正")!=-1)?"&asc=ASC":"";
   java.log(body);
}
else{
	key=java.encodeURI(key,"gbk");
    body+="&keyword="+key;
	}
body+="&page="+page;
    a="https://bbs.fanfanx.com/search.php?" + String(body);

</js>

function parse(data){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	
	//链接生成
	 let u=/^\d+/.test(url)?"https://hongxiuzhao.me":url;
 try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
 try {tag = args[3];


 
  u=tag=="cat2"?'https://hongxiua.com/category/'+url+'/{{page}}/2/0':u;
 u=tag=="cat0"?'https://hongxiua.com/category/'+url+'/{{page}}/0/0':u;
 u=tag=="cat1"?'https://hongxiua.com/category/'+url+'/{{page}}/1/0':u;
 u=tag=="tag"?'https://hongxiua.com/tags/'+url+'/{{page}}':u;

 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}

function FlexBox(title, url, num){
		 let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
	//数值设定
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
result=JSON.stringify(all.map(data=>{
	let args=parse(data);
	return FlexBox.apply(null, args)
	}))
</js>

header:
<js>
(()=>{
	var v = String(source.getVariable())
	if(v.match(/^[1一壹qQ]$/)){
		url = "com.xiaoxiaobook.zuiread1"
	}else if(v.match(/^[2二贰wW]$/)){
		url = "com.diandianbook.androidreading1"
	}else{
		url = "com.ruffianhankin.meritreader1"
	}

	time = Math.round(new Date()/1000)
	sign = java.md5Encode(url+time+"vhjJVz1St6tK7!8n#B0MqRIuE2Dh7!C#")

	headers = JSON.stringify({
		"pt": "1",
		"time": String(time),
		"sign": String(sign),
		"package": String(url).replace(/1$/,''),
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 7_1_2 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/537.51.2 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/7.0 Mobile/11D167 Safari/9537.53"
	})
    return headers
})()
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let free = source.getVariable() == "1"
let data = JSON.parse(result).data
let bid = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1]
let chapterList = []
data['vs'].forEach(list => {
  chapterList.push({
    name: String(list.vN),
    voltype: true
  })
  list['cs'].forEach(chapter => {
    let isVip = chapter.sS!="1" && !free ? "💰":""
    let href = `https://vipreader.qidian.com/chapter/${bid}/${chapter.id}/`
    let url = list.hS == true || free ? `${href},{'webView': true}` : href
    chapterList.push({
      name: String(isVip+chapter.cN).trim().replace(/^(\d+)(?![\s\d卷部章节回.])/, '$1 ').replace(/\s+/g, " "),
      url: url,
      info: `更新时间: ${chapter.uT} 字数: ${chapter.cnt}`,
      voltype: false
    })
  })
})
chapterList
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
paperid=baseUrl.match(/paperid=(\d+)/)[1];
code=result.match(/vercodechk.*?'[^']+'/)?result.match(/vercodechk.*?'([^']+)'/)[1]:'';
url=book.origin+'/showpapercolor.php,';
body='paperid='+paperid+'&vercodechk='+code;
option={
"method":"POST",
"body":String(body)
}
result=java.ajax(url+JSON.stringify(option));

eggs=java.getString('@@class.uk-placeholder.-1@html');
if(!eggs.match(/【作家想說的話：】|加載中.../) && eggs!=""){
eggs="【彩蛋内容：】"+eggs
}else{eggs=''}
write=java.getString('@@id.colorpanelwritersay@html');
result=result+write+eggs;
if(!String(result).match(/[\u4e00-\u9fa5]/) && !(String(result).match(/login\.php/))){
result="此章节需要购买\n💰"+java.getString('@@class.uk-card.0@class.uk-list.0@tag.li.10@text&&class.uk-alert-danger@html')
}else{result=result}
String(result).match(/login.php/)?'请登录后刷新正文阅读':result
</js>
##<.*?mages/fullcolor.png.*?>
ruleContent.replaceRegex: ##此章节需要购买[\s\S]+?💰[\s\S]+?此章节需要购买[\s\S]+?💰##请刷新正文看彩蛋

<js>
str = String(result);
result = str.replace(/原創/g, '')
.replace(/\//g, ',')
.replace(/\[/g, '')
.replace(/\]/g, '')
.replace(/.未設置./g, '')
.replace(/來/g, '来')
.replace(/男男/g, '')
.replace(/強/g, '强')
.replace(/現/g, '现')
.replace(/劇/g, '剧')
.replace(/結/g, '结')
.replace(/連載中/g, '连载')
.replace(/纖細/g, '纤细')
.replace(/輕/g, '轻')
.replace(/鬆/g, '松')
.replace(/馬/g, '马')
.replace(/園/g, '园')
.replace(/溫/g, '温')
.replace(/帥/g, '帅')
.replace(/職場/g, '职场')
.replace(/靈異/g, '灵异')
.replace(/種/g, '种')
.replace(/網遊/g, '网游')
.replace(/勵/g, '励')
.replace(/宮/g, '宫')
.replace(/會/g, '会')
.replace(/運動/g, '运动')
.replace(/話/g, '话')
.replace(/俠/g, '侠')
.replace(/羅/g, '罗')
.replace(/視/g, '视')
.replace(/懸/g, '悬')
</js>

<js>
paperid=baseUrl.match(/paperid=(\d+)/)[1];
code=result.match(/vercodechk.*?'[^']+'/)?result.match(/vercodechk.*?'([^']+)'/)[1]:'';
url=book.origin+'/showpapercolor.php,';
body='paperid='+paperid+'&vercodechk='+code;
option={
"method":"POST",
"body":String(body)
}
result=java.ajax(url+JSON.stringify(option));

eggs=java.getString('@@class.uk-placeholder.-1@html');
if(!eggs.match(/【作家想說的話：】|加載中.../) && eggs!=""){
eggs="【彩蛋内容：】"+eggs
}else{eggs=''}
write=java.getString('@@id.colorpanelwritersay@html');
result=result+write+eggs;
if(!String(result).match(/[\u4e00-\u9fa5]/) && !(String(result).match(/login\.php/))){
result="此章节需要购买\n💰"+java.getString('@@class.uk-card.0@class.uk-list.0@tag.li.10@text&&class.uk-alert-danger@html')
}else{result=result}
String(result).match(/login.php/)?'请登录后刷新正文阅读':result
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
if(result.match(/請勿瀏覽及購買本館商品，本網站已依照台灣網站內容分級規定處理。/)){
url="https://www.popo.tw{{@@id.books-form@action}}";

value=result.match(/name="_poporf-tk001" value="([^"]+)">/)[1];

Cookie=String(cookie.getCookie(baseUrl));
body='cid=&type=&_poporf-tk001='+value;

cookies=java.post(url,body,{"cookie":Cookie}).cookies();

Cookies=String(cookies).match(/\{(.*?)\}/)[1]+'; '+Cookie;

header={"Cookie":String(Cookies)}
headers={"headers":JSON.stringify(header)}
java.put('header',JSON.stringify(headers));
Url=baseUrl+','+JSON.stringify(headers);

result=String(java.ajax(Url))

}else{result=result}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
if(result.match(/請勿瀏覽及購買本館商品，本網站已依照台灣網站內容分級規定處理。/)){
url=baseUrl+'/limit18';
value=result.match(/name="_poporf-tk001" value="([^"]+)">/)[1];

Cookie=String(java.getCookie(baseUrl,null));
body='cid=&type=&_poporf-tk001='+value;

cookies=java.post(url,body,{"cookie":Cookie}).cookies();

Cookies=String(cookies).match(/\{(.*?)\}/)[1]+'; '+Cookie;

header={"Cookie":String(Cookies)}
headers={"headers":JSON.stringify(header)}
java.put('header',JSON.stringify(headers));
Url=baseUrl+','+JSON.stringify(headers);
result=String(java.ajax(Url))
}else{result=result}
</js>

ruleContent.replaceRegex:
<js>
String(result)
.replace(/\s*发表于\s*/g," 🕡 ")
.replace(/回复:『\s*/g,'回复:『')
.replace(/([cC])hanter((\s)?\d+)/g,'$1hapter$2')
</js>
##以下内容需要积分高于 \d+ 才可浏览

ruleExplore.author: tag.cite.0@a@text||tag.cite.0@text
ruleExplore.kind: {{@@tag.th@tag.a.3@progress}},{{@@th@em@a@text}},{{@@th@img.1@title##(热度):\s(\d+)##$2 $1}},{{@@class.num@a@text##(\d+)##$1 回复}},{{@@class.num@em@text##(\d+)##$1 查看}}##帖子被加分
ruleExplore.name: tag.th@tag.a.2@text||tag.a.-1@text##公告

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var n;
if
((result.match(/ \/ (\d+) 页/))!=null){
n=result.match(/ \/ (\d+) 页/)[1];
var list=[];
for(let i=1;i<=n;i++){
list.push({k:'第'+i+'页',v:baseUrl.replace(/page(?:%3D|=)\d+/g,'&page='+i)});
}
}else{
var list=[{k:'第1页',v:baseUrl}];
}
list
</js>

<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|章节目录|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|分享书籍.*|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

};
book;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|章节目录|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('#bookIntro').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

<js>
var time = Math.round(new Date()/1000);
lll=[
"appId=",
"time="+time,
"osType=2",
"product=1",
"sysVer=10",
"ver=2.1.7",
"packageName=com.lestory.jihua.an",
"lang-app=zh-Hans",
"lang=zh-hans",
"locale=CN"
]
function toJson(list){
    json = "";
    for (i in list)
    {
        all = list[i].match(/(.*?)=(.*)/);
        key = all[1];
        value = all[2];
        json += '"' + key + '":' + '"' + value + '",'
    }
    json = '{' + String(json).replace(/,$/,'')+ '}'
    return json;
}
function sign(list){
var sb='';
sb+="Fb0gqLMSf5Android";
list=list.sort();
i=0;
while(i<list.length){
if(i==0){
sb+=list[i]
}else{
    if(list[i].match(/lang-app=/)){  
      i2=i+1;
     i3=i2+1;
     if (list[i2] != null && list[i2].match(/lang=/)) {
                        sb+="&";
                        sb+=list[i2];
                        
                        sb+="&";
                        sb+=list[i];
                        
                        i = i3;
                    }
           }
                sb+="&";
                sb+=list[i];             
      }
i++
}
sb+="AEdDtho2CjiH901aVK7swFqclu6NmzJ4";
return String(java.md5Encode(sb)).toUpperCase()
}

if(!baseUrl.match(/welfare\/award/)){
if(baseUrl.match(/bookid/)){
java.put('token',baseUrl.match(/token=(.*)/)[1]);
java.put('book',baseUrl.match(/(\d+)/)[1]);
list=[{"name":"书币余额","book_id":baseUrl.match(/(\d+)/)[1]}];
result=JSON.stringify(list)
}else{

page=java.get('page');
cat=baseUrl.match(/cat=(\d+)/)[1];
finished=baseUrl.match(/finished=(\d+)/)[1];
li=lll;
li.push("finished="+finished);
li.push("cat="+cat);
li.push("page_num="+page);
sign=sign(li);
li.push("sign="+sign);
j=toJson(li);

option={
"method": "POST",
"body": String(j)
}
url='http://api.lestory.cn/book/category-index,'+JSON.stringify(option);
java.ajax(url)}}else{
l=[];
var token=baseUrl.match(/token=(.*)/)[1];
li=lll;
li.push("read_time=44800");
li.push("token="+token);
s=sign(li);
li.push("sign="+s);
j=toJson(li);
option={
"method": "POST",
"body": String(j)
}
url='http://api.lestory.cn/remain/add-read-time,'+JSON.stringify(option);
l.push(String(java.ajax(url)));
for(i=1;i<=10;i++){
url='http://api.lestory.cn/welfare/award?token='+token+'&award_type='+i;
l.push(String(java.ajax(url)));
}
for(i=1;i<=15;i++){
url='http://api.lestory.cn/welfare/award?token='+token+'&award_type='+i;
l.push(String(java.ajax(url)));
}
for(i=1;i<=15;i++){
url='http://api.lestory.cn/welfare/award?token='+token+'&award_type='+i;
l.push(String(java.ajax(url)));
}
result=JSON.stringify(l);}
</js>

<js>
/*调试->右上角的小虫子，随便搜一个词*/
/*Token写了东西的话要删掉才能进行下面步骤：
①填上电话号码点调试会获取验证码；
②填上验证码点调试会获取token；
③把token填在Token【目录的章节url那也有个token记得也要填，不填的话从发现点的书是没有登录的】；
④把电话号码跟验证码的值删了【❗️填了电话号码会一搜索就发验证码】，保存书源*/
/*如登录过期需要重新登录，请删除以前填写的token再调试获取验证码，重复前面的步骤*/

电话号码="";

验证码="";

Token="34304776fc02d974a641eef13b603e20";

//下面不要动
var time = Math.round(new Date()/1000);
token=java.put('token',Token);
lll=[
"appId=",
"osType=2",
"product=1",
"sysVer=10",
"time="+time,
"token="+token,
"ver=2.1.7",
"packageName=com.lestory.jihua.an",
"lang-app=zh-Hans",
"lang=zh-hans",
"locale=CN"
]
function toJson(list){
    json = "";
    for (i in list)
    {
        all = list[i].match(/(.*?)=(.*)/);
        key = all[1];
        value = all[2];
        json += '"' + key + '":' + '"' + value + '",'
    }
    json = '{' + String(json).replace(/,$/,'')+ '}'
    return json;
}

function sign(list){
var sb='';
sb+="Fb0gqLMSf5Android";
list=list.sort();
i=0;
while(i<list.length){
if(i==0){
sb+=list[i]
}else{
    if(list[i].match(/lang-app=/)){  
      i2=i+1;
     i3=i2+1;
     if (list[i2] != null && list[i2].match(/lang=/)) {
                        sb+="&";
                        sb+=list[i2];
                        
                        sb+="&";
                        sb+=list[i];
                        
                        i = i3;
                    }
           }
                sb+="&";
                sb+=list[i];             
      }
i++
}
sb+="AEdDtho2CjiH901aVK7swFqclu6NmzJ4";
return String(java.md5Encode(sb)).toUpperCase()
}



//获取验证码开始
num=电话号码;
y=验证码;
if(num.match(/^\d{11}$/) && !y  && !Token){
list2=lll;
list2.push( "mobile=86"+num);
s=sign(list2);
list2.push("sign="+s);
json2=toJson(list2);
option1={
"method": "POST",
"body": String(json2)
}
url='http://api.lestory.cn/message/send,'+JSON.stringify(option1);
java.log(JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).msg=="success"?"验证码发送成功，请注意短信":"验证码获取失败，请稍候再试");
}else if(y && !Token){
list2=lll;
list2.push("mobile=86"+num);
list2.push("code="+y);
s=sign(list2);
list2.push("sign="+s);
json2=toJson(list2)

option1={
"method": "POST",
"body": String(json2)
}
url='http://api.lestory.cn/user/mobile-login,'+JSON.stringify(option1);
a=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url));
java.log(a.msg=="success"?'❗️下面是你的Token，请复制❗️\n'+a.data.user_token:JSON.stringify(a));
}
//获取验证码结束

li=lll;
li.push("page_num="+page);
li.push("keyword="+key);
s1=sign(li);
li.push("sign="+s1);
j=toJson(li);
option={
"method": "POST",
"body": String(j)
}
url='http://api.lestory.cn/book/search,'+JSON.stringify(option)
</js>

bookSourceComment:
// Error: No results for path: $['data']['book']

Error: No results for path: $['data']['book']
使用:先输入手机号然后点√发送验证码,后输入验证码登陆
注意:若发现出现错误,请重新打开关闭发现页
支持:验证码登陆|购买|签到|发现|书架
exploreUrl:
<js>
function getParams(params,isPost){
 let desKey = Packages.java.lang.String('ZUreQN0Epkpxh3pooWOgixjTfPwumCTYWzYTQ7SMgDnqFLQ1s9tqpVhkGf02we89moQwhSQ07DVzc3LWupRgbVvm29aYeY7zyFN').getBytes('UTF_8')
 let des = Packages.cn.hutool.crypto.symmetric.DES("ECB","PKCS5Padding", desKey)
 let md5Key = 'NpkTYvpvhJjEog8Y051gQDHmReY54z5t3F0zSd9QEFuxWGqfC8g8Y4GPuabq0KPdxArlji4dSnnHCARHnkqYBLu7iIw55ibTo18'
 let timestamp = Date.now()
 let requestId = java.randomUUID().replace('-','')
 let param = des.encryptBase64(JSON.stringify(Object.assign(params,{'timestamp': timestamp})))
 let sign = String(java.digestHex(java.base64Encode(`param=${param}&requestId=${requestId}&timestamp=${timestamp}&key=${md5Key}`),'md5')).toUpperCase()
 let data = JSON.stringify({
    param: param,
    requestId: requestId,
    sign: sign,
    timestamp: timestamp
 })
 return isPost? JSON.stringify({ method: "POST", body: data }) :`timestamp=${timestamp}&requestId=${requestId}&sign=${sign}&param=${encodeURIComponent(param)}`
}
let style1 = {"layout_flexGrow": 0,"layout_flexBasisPercent": 1}
let style2 = {"layout_flexGrow": 0.25,"layout_flexBasisPercent": -1}
let style3 = {"layout_flexGrow": 0,"layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.29}
let findList = [{"title": "༺个人中心༺ ","url": '',"style": style1},{"title": "每日签到","url": `https://api.hwnovel.com/api/ciyuanji/client/sign/sign,${getParams({},true)}`,"style": style2},{"title": "个人书架","url": `https://api.hwnovel.com/api/ciyuanji/client/bookrack/getUserBookRackList?${getParams({"pageNo":1,"pageSize":9999},false)}`,"style": style2}]
findList.push({"title": "༺男生分类༺ ","url": '',"style": style1})
// bookType: 1 代表男生. bookType: 4 代表女生
// 获取男生分类
res = JSON.parse(java.ajax(`https://api.hwnovel.com/api/ciyuanji/client/classify/getBookClassifyListByParams?${getParams({"classifyId":0,"pageNo":1,"pageSize":99,"bookType":"1"},false)}`))
res.data.classifyList.forEach(o=> {
  let params1 = getParams({"firstClassify":o.classifyId,"rankType":"1","pageNo": 1,"pageSize": 30,"bookType":"1"},false)
  findList.push({"title": o.classifyName, "url": `https://api.hwnovel.com/api/ciyuanji/client/book/getBookListByParams?${params1}`,"style": style1})
  let len =  o.childList.length
  len>1&&o.childList.forEach((c,i)=>{
  	   let params2 = getParams({"firstClassify":o.classifyId,"rankType":"1","pageNo": 1,"pageSize": 30,"bookType":"1","secondClassify":c.classifyId},false)
  	  let style=i==len-1?style3:style2
    findList.push({"title":c.classifyName, "url": `https://api.hwnovel.com/api/ciyuanji/client/book/getBookListByParams?${params2}`,"style":style})
  	})
})
// 获取男生标签
findList.push({"title": "༺ 男生标签༺","url": '',"style": style1})
res = JSON.parse(java.ajax(`https://api.hwnovel.com/api/ciyuanji/client/tag/getAppTagList?${getParams({"pageNo":1,"pageSize":99,"bookType":"1"},false)}`))
let tagLen =  res.data.list.length
res.data.list.forEach((o,i)=> {
  let params = getParams({"tagId":o.tagId,"rankType":"1","pageNo": 1,"pageSize": 30,"bookType":"1"},false)
  let style=i==tagLen-1?style3:style2
  findList.push({"title": o.tagName, "url": `https://api.hwnovel.com/api/ciyuanji/client/book/getBookListByTagId?${params}`,"style": style})
})
JSON.stringify(findList)
</js>
loginUrl:
<js>
var username = String(source.getLoginInfoMap().get("手机号"))
var passwd = String(source.getLoginInfoMap().get("验证码"))
// 工具类
var md5Key = 'NpkTYvpvhJjEog8Y051gQDHmReY54z5t3F0zSd9QEFuxWGqfC8g8Y4GPuabq0KPdxArlji4dSnnHCARHnkqYBLu7iIw55ibTo18'
var desKey = Packages.java.lang.String('ZUreQN0Epkpxh3pooWOgixjTfPwumCTYWzYTQ7SMgDnqFLQ1s9tqpVhkGf02we89moQwhSQ07DVzc3LWupRgbVvm29aYeY7zyFN').getBytes('UTF_8')
var des = Packages.cn.hutool.crypto.symmetric.DES("ECB","PKCS5Padding", desKey)
if(!username) throw new Error("请输入手机号")
// 发送验证码
if(username != 0 && passwd == 0) {
  let timestamp = Date.now()
  let requestId = java.randomUUID().replace('-','')
  let param = des.encryptBase64(JSON.stringify({phone: username,smsType: "1",timestamp: timestamp}))
  let sign = String(java.digestHex(java.base64Encode(`param=${param}&requestId=${requestId}&timestamp=${timestamp}&key=${md5Key}`),'md5')).toUpperCase()
  let data = JSON.stringify({
    param: param,
    requestId: requestId,
    sign: sign,
    timestamp: timestamp
  })
  let op = JSON.stringify({ method: "POST", body: data })
  let res = JSON.parse(java.ajax(`https://api.hwnovel.com/api/ciyuanji/client/login/getPhoneCode,${op}`))
  if(res.code != '200') throw new Error(res.msg)
  java.toast("验证码已发送，请输入验证码登录")
}
// 验证码登录
if(username != 0 && passwd != 0) {
  let timestamp = Date.now()
  let requestId = java.randomUUID().replace('-','')
  let param = des.encryptBase64(JSON.stringify({phone: username,phoneCode: passwd,timestamp: timestamp}))
  let sign = String(java.digestHex(java.base64Encode(`param=${param}&requestId=${requestId}&timestamp=${timestamp}&key=${md5Key}`),'md5')).toUpperCase()
  let data = JSON.stringify({
    param: param,
    requestId: requestId,
    sign: sign,
    timestamp: timestamp
  })
  let op = JSON.stringify({ method: "POST", body: data})
  let res = JSON.parse(java.ajax(`https://api.hwnovel.com/api/ciyuanji/client/login/phone,${op}`))
  if(res.code != '200') throw new Error(res.msg)
let userInfo = res.data.userInfo source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify({ "token": userInfo.token}))
  java.toast("登陆成功")
}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|章节目录|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　🔸最近更新：' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|分享书籍.*|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: J.select('.novel-header-r a').attr('href'),
};
book;
</js>

Error: 发现失效, 搜索目录失效

迷迭22.2.16。书源＆小说交流群637775313
网站有少量废驴小说。
这网站部分正文有防扒机制（w页不懂解），m页面用webview勉强能解决，将就可用。
比如：
大秦：从弃婴到千古一帝
